generatedTitle: Overview of Indian Bureau of Mines

extractFactDictList.question: When was the Indian Bureau of Mines established?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Indian Bureau of Mines was established in 1948 as a subordinate office under the Ministry of Mines, Government of India. (Source: IBM website)

extractFactDictList.question: Where is the headquarters of the Indian Bureau of Mines located?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The headquarters of IBM is located in Nagpur, Maharashtra. (Source: IBM website)

extractFactDictList.question: What is the responsibility of the Indian Bureau of Mines?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The organization is responsible for the regulation and development of the mining sector in India. (Source: IBM website)
extractFactDictList.phrase: Regulation and development of the mining sector in India

extractFactDictList.question: Who appoints the Director General of IBM?
extractFactDictList.sentence: IBM is headed by a Director General, who is appointed by the Central Government. (Source: IBM website)

extractFactDictList.question: Does IBM have regional offices and mineral processing laboratories?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The organization has a network of regional offices and mineral processing laboratories across the country. (Source: IBM website)
